alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 10 at 3:00AM PST until February 10 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST TODAY... * WHAT...Dense fog, with visibility less than a quarter of a mile at times. * WHERE...In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area and I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County. In Oregon, South Willamette Valley, Central Willamette Valley, Greater Portland Metro Area and Lower Columbia. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS....Conditions gradually improve later this morning. Motorists should be ready for quick and sudden drops in visibility in the fog.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. If walking or biking, weather reflective material to make yourself more visible in the fog.

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia; South Willamette Valley
